# Reactivity Package Instructions

## Package Overview
This package will be distributed under the name `@ailuros/reactivity`.
@ailuros/reactivity is intended to provide a custom reactive system based on TC39 Signals, built on top of [alien-signals](https://github.com/stackblitz/alien-signals).

## Main Instructions
- When responding, please use context7 to understand the specific specifications and usage of [alien-signals](https://github.com/stackblitz/alien-signals).
